name: philtrum
description: CLI: Uses handlebars to generate a html file

scripts.test: node bin/philtrum.js tests/template.html -i tests/input.js -o tests/output.html --helpers tests/helpers.js --open
scripts.testpug: node bin/philtrum.js tests/template.pug --engine pug -i tests/input.js -o tests/output2.html --helpers tests/helpers.js --open

author: demingongo (https://github.com/demingongo)
